If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer From high-heeled sneakers to the sleeping bag coat and parachute haute couture, legendary designer Norma Kamali has always been an innovator. Mirrored by her far-flung design pursuits in interiors and architecture, Kamali's sartorial style is pointed, focused, and often unexpected. Always on the leading edge of the cultural front, Norma Kamali has created iconic images throughout her career, from Farrah's famous red swimsuit to Gaga's music video wedding dress.
